dcterms:creator: Alex Raymond
Hatice Gunes
Amanda Prorok
dcterms:description: A discrete navigation environment consisting of a 15x15 grid of cells, where each cell represents a different type of road. The environment is designed to test reinforcement learning agents under complex rulesets.
dcterms:title: GridDrive

dcterms:creator: Alex Raymond
Hatice Gunes
Amanda Prorok
dcterms:description: A continuous navigation environment represented as a planar graph with vertices and edges, where agents must navigate between junctions while adhering to complex rulesets.
dcterms:title: GraphDrive

dcterms:creator: Alex Raymond
Hatice Gunes
Amanda Prorok
dcterms:description: Various environments designed with different levels of rule complexity to evaluate the performance of reinforcement learning agents under diverse regulatory conditions.
dcterms:title: Various environments with different levels of rule complexity
